long_description: With soft, springy cushioning, lightweight Flywire support, and deep flex sole grooves for a smooth efficient stride, the Nike LunarGlide+ 4 road-running shoes ensure your comfort mile after mile. Lightweight polyester mesh uppers are highly breathable for enhanced comfort; uppers were designed with minimal seams for maximum comfort. Ultralight Flywire supports use reinforced threads to wrap the midfoot and rearfoot areas for a secure, supportive fit that minimizes slippage. Thermoplastic urethane toe caps and heel counters deliver additional protection, structure and support. Polyester linings provide moisture managment to keep feet comfortable mile after mile. Lunarlon foam cushioning absorbs shock while delivering an incredibly soft and springy ride. Midsoles feature different density foams to cushion and support your feet throughout their stride. Rubber outsoles maximize traction and durability; flex grooves along shoes enhance flexibility for an efficient stride. A Nike+ sensor works with your iPod(R) nano, iPod touch 2G or later or iPhone(R) 3GS or later to track distance, time, pace and calories burned, relaying the info to you. Waterproof and virtually unbreakable, the Nike+ sensor fits perfectly into the pocket under the left insole (sensor not included).
